title: Three Men, Green Writing
credit_line: Gift of Aluminum Company of America
provenance_text:
Lester F. Johnson [1919-2010], New York, NY. G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, until June 26, 1965; G. David Thompson estate, June 1965 to November 1966; The Aluminum Company of America, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1966 to December 2, 1982 [1]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1982.

Notes:
[1]. Part of the Alcoa Collection of Contemporary Art.  This work was included in an exhibition of works acquired by Alcoa from the G. David Thompson collection (no. 23) held at Carnegie Institute in 1967, followed by a multi-year national tour.

creator.death_place: Westhampton (Suffolk county, New York State, United States)
